data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a megawidget to display a program window. I was tyred in
    every application to create a menu, prefs dialog, about .... I
    search for a standard way and write this module. This remember the
    font, size and postion from the Mainwindow and use also the function
    from Tk::Mainwindow. Special things: About, Splash, Menu, Statusbar,
    Help etc.pp. More Information with Screenshot:

    http://xpix.dieserver.de/content/perlmoduls/tk_programwindow/
